name: Pancake Pandemonium
description:
This is a WIP. It's basically a proof of concept of some of the game features we will have in the full game, as many of the vital game systems have yet to be put in. We hope you enjoy the aesthetics and look forward to the full game!

Our game is at https://github.com/gradyfitz/unijam-2020 , we'll upload soon!

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move

Enter - Interact
